name: Curse of the Delivery Boy
description:
Deliver Packages and Stay IN CONTROL

  • Deliver packages while keeping your stress meter low. 
  • Stress is increased by running and by colliding with other people.
  • Hunters will chase and attempt to kill you if they see you. 
  • If your stress peaks you will transform into a monster. 
  • Control the monster and kill hunters to gain points, while avoiding killing people to prevent losing points.

Controls:

When in Human Form:

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift (Hold) to Run
  • Left Click - Deliver Package / Pick up Box

When in Monster Form

  • Left Click (Hold) & Move Mouse - Change Direction

Make sure to rate your favourite games!

Also check out Rock Paper SHIFT on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1346110/Rock_Paper_SHIFT/
